impact-statement: By examining natural variation in DNA methylation for effects on parent-of-origin specific expression, it is demonstrated that epiallelic variation intersects with genomic imprinting mechanisms to produce novel gene expression patterns in seeds.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
